title: Block Programming with AI Friends - Grade 3
description: Learn programming through visual blocks while discovering how AI helps us solve problems, aligned with elementary computer science standards
learningOutcomes: Create simple programs using visual programming blocks
Understand sequence, loops, and conditions in programming
Recognize how AI uses similar programming concepts
Solve problems step-by-step like a computer

sections.title: Welcome to Block Programming!
sections.content: Block programming is like building with digital LEGO blocks! Each block tells the computer what to do. AI systems are built using similar building blocks that help them think and make decisions.

sections.aiConnection: AI chatbots like those in educational apps use similar step-by-step thinking to have conversations with students.

teacherNotes.platform: Use Scratch Jr. or similar visual programming environment suitable for Grade 3
teacherNotes.scaffolding: Start with teacher-led examples, then guided practice, finally independent creation
teacherNotes.aiConnections: Constantly relate programming concepts to familiar AI applications kids use
teacherNotes.differentiation: Provide extra visual supports for struggling learners, extension challenges for advanced students
teacherNotes.assessment: Focus on understanding concepts rather than perfect syntax; use peer sharing and reflection
